duties_responsibilities.duty: Answer incoming calls to provide assistance to patients and physicians requesting referrals and appointments.
Pre-register patients for appointments and tests, verify and update patient demographic and insurance information.
Establish and maintain ongoing partnerships with designated clinical partners to ensure achievement of aligned goals.
Accurately pre-register patients for appointments and tests.
Verify and update patient demographic and insurance information.
Understand and identify insurance types, validate contract status of insurance with Loyola for physicians and facility to ensure maximum reimbursement and correct payment.
Review accuracy and make appropriate changes as needed.
Remind patient of any financial obligations and document appropriately.
Remind patients to obtain necessary referral forms and/or additional documentation and bring to clinic/ancillary department to ensure highest allowable reimbursement.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree OR equivalent training acquired via work experience or education
